articles.description: Kylian Mbappe says there is "no limit" on what he and Real Madrid can achieve together after he scored on his debut against Atalanta to help the club win a record sixth Uefa Super Cup.
articles.title: A trophy, a goal and 'no limit' - Madrid's Mbappe era begins

articles.description: We ask 30 BBC Sport football pundits to predict who will win the Premier League title, and which clubs will finish in the top four this season.
articles.title: Premier League predictions 2024-25: BBC Sport pundits pick their top four

articles.description: Nineteen years and 10 miles separated Zambia's football team from a lost, golden generation on a fateful night in Libreville.
articles.title: Zambia: The 1993 air crash and the 2012 Afcon underdogs

articles.description: The Court of Arbitration for Sport condemns "outrageous statements" that it was biased in its decision not to reconsider stripping US gymnast Jordan Chiles of her Olympic bronze medal.
articles.title: Jordan Chiles: Cas condemns 'outrageous statements' over ruling

articles.description: Wayne Rooney gets his first win as Plymouth Argyle head coach as his side beats Cheltenham Town 3-0 in the Carabao Cup first round.
articles.title: Plymouth Argyle 3-0 Cheltenham Town: Wayne Rooney gets first win as Plymouth boss in EFL Cup

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Romeo Lavia speaks about his belief that the club are building something special - and how he is ready to be part of it after an injury-troubled year.
articles.title: Romeo Lavia: Chelsea midfielder on dealing with injury setbacks

articles.description: Former world number one Naomi Osaka says she does not "feel like I'm in my body" following her return to tennis after a maternity break.
articles.title: Naomi Osaka: Former world number one does not feel like herself after maternity break

articles.description: Football will reach saturation point if matches keep being added to the calendar, according to Premier League chief executive Richard Masters.
articles.title: Premier League: Football heading towards 'saturation point' says Richard Masters

articles.description: Four-time winners Nottingham Forest are drawn at home to Newcastle in the second round of the EFL Cup.
articles.title: Carabao Cup draw: Four-time winners Nottingham Forest host Newcastle in second round

articles.description: Oval Invincibles miss out on the chance to confirm a place in the final of the men's Hundred competition as they lose by six wickets to Trent Rockets in a thrilling encounter at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: The Hundred 2024: Rockets beat leaders Invincibles in thriller
